LogConfiguration

Defines an interface for specifying the configuration of the logging system.

  • minimumSeverity

    The minimum LogSeverity supported by the configuration.

    Declaration

    Swift

    var minimumSeverity: LogSeverity { get }
  • filters

    The list of LogFilters to be used.

    Declaration

    Swift

    var filters: [LogFilter]  { get }
  • recorders

    The list of LogRecorders to be used.

    Declaration

    Swift

    var recorders: [LogRecorder]  { get }
  • synchronousMode

    A flag indicating when synchronous mode should be used for the configuration.

    Declaration

    Swift

    var synchronousMode: Bool  { get }
